fields.label: Welcome to your wordpress dashboard
fields.message: This is where you can change some settings for the look and feel of the websites. Especially content in the header, footer, contact and social links if it happens to change in the future. Browse around.

fields.label: Form ID
fields.name: footer_form
fields.instructions: Insert form id here. (Can be found from the form section of the website)

sub_fields.label: Map Link
sub_fields.name: gps_map_link
sub_fields.instructions: Visit google maps, look up address and click share. This generates a short url to include here.

sub_fields.label: Map Link
sub_fields.name: gps_map_link
sub_fields.instructions: Visit google maps, look up address and click share. This generates a short url to include here.

sub_fields.label: Map Link
sub_fields.name: gps_map_link
sub_fields.instructions: Visit google maps, look up address and click share. This generates a short url to include here.

sub_fields.label: Link for Logo
sub_fields.name: link_for_logo
sub_fields.instructions: By default if this logo is linked it will open in a new window. Leave this field blank if you do not want a link.

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: By default opens in new window

fields.label: Typekit
fields.name: typekit
fields.instructions: Copy and paste the code you receive when setting up the project in Typekit.

fields.label: Google Fonts
fields.name: google_fonts
fields.instructions: Copy and paste the code you receive when setting up the project in Google Fonts.

fields.label: JS message
fields.message:
Currently not set up, in production.
(Blank - no pages. Asterisk - all pages. Or use a comma delimited list of page ids.)

fields.label: Colorbox
fields.name: colorbox
fields.instructions: Requires individual instantiation in footer, separate CSS file.

fields.label: Flexslider
fields.name: flexslider
fields.instructions: Requires individual instantiation in footer, separate CSS file.

fields.label: Mobile Detect
fields.name: mobile_detect
fields.instructions: Needs to appear in header rather than footer.
